channel.title: How can i fix
channel.description: whenever you trade a npc on my server it doesnt work =( how can i fix this? Also how do i edit the like emote boxes so they bank and stuff... annndd how do you edit the log in settings...(where it says like owner and stuff) for expample (when you log in there is like some letters at the top of the screen that say owner=...

item.title: How can i fix
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

For the shops, you have to add them.
The emote boxes have to do with frames under update();, and the text can be edited by searching for a keyword (ctrl+f).

Read full topic
